input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Sunday Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Vapour Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Women's Core Racing Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Thermal Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pro Men's Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Delta Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pro Midweight Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Thermal Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pro Women's Bib'
  - Name='Men's Core Jersey Vis'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Bib Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a shorts product, whereas the reference is a jersey; different product category and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a cycling jersey like the reference; likely similar in function and features but possibly a performance or pro variation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Vapour Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts are different from jerseys in silhouette and function, so low relevancy.
Also a core jersey for women and racing, quite similar in function though may differ in fit or design details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Thermal Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts even if thermal and core range, are functionally and structurally different from jerseys.
A midweight thermal jersey likely functions similarly though with different weight and insulation characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Pedal Mafia midweight thermal jersey for men, close in category to core jersey but thermal weight likely means different usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product category and likely function, just a pro variant but still a men's cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Delta Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a jersey but long sleeve and pro delta variant, so some differences in silhouette and use conditions.
A midweight jersey for pro use, presumably similar function but may differ in brand and exact features.
Base layers differ in construction and use from jerseys, lower relevancy despite same brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts, different product type and function from jerseys.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the exact match for the reference product (core jersey), same brand, likely identical or very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Thermal Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts again, thermal variant, different product type to jersey.
Bib shorts for women, minimal relevancy to men's core jersey.
A men's core jersey, likely similar to the reference, possibly with high visibility features, very relevant.
Same core jersey type for women from same brand, very similar product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts differ in function and construction from jerseys.
